departments.name: Computer Science and Engineering
departments.directions: Enter through the main gate. Walk straight past Block A. Turn right at Block B. Take the stairs to the 2nd floor.

departments.name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
departments.directions: From the main entrance → Walk straight to Block C → Department is on the 1st floor.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.directions: Enter through the main gate → Turn left to Block A → Library is on the ground floor near the reception.

facilities.name: Canteen
facilities.directions: From Block B → Walk straight towards Block D → Canteen is located right behind Block D.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.directions: Exit from the main gate → Walk 200m north → Hostel entrance is near the sports ground.

labs.name: Computer Lab
labs.directions: From the CSE Department on 2nd floor → Take the stairs to 3rd floor → Lab is opposite to Room 302.

labs.name: Electronics Lab
labs.directions: Enter Block C → Walk straight past the lobby → Lab is next to the seminar hall.

semester_qna.question: When does the 7th semester begin?
semester_qna.answer: The 7th semester begins on August 3, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is the semester commencement for 7th sem?
semester_qna.answer: The semester commences on August 3, 2025.

semester_qna.question: What event is on August 15 2025?
semester_qna.answer: August 15, 2025 is Independence Day.

semester_qna.question: Is there a holiday on August 15?
semester_qna.answer: Yes, August 15 is Independence Day and is a holiday.

semester_qna.question: When is the technical talk in August?
semester_qna.answer: The technical talk is scheduled on August 23, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is Ganesha Chaturthi?
semester_qna.answer: Ganesha Chaturthi is on August 30, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When are Phase-1 project presentations?
semester_qna.answer: Phase-1 project presentations are on August 27 and August 28, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When does placement training start?
semester_qna.answer: Placement training starts on September 1, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When does placement training end?
semester_qna.answer: Placement training ends on September 5, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is CIE-1 for 7th semester?
semester_qna.answer: CIE-1 is from September 22 to September 24, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is the industrial visit?
semester_qna.answer: The industrial visit is on September 27, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is Gandhi Jayanti?
semester_qna.answer: Gandhi Jayanti is on October 2, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is Ayudha Pooja?
semester_qna.answer: Ayudha Pooja is on October 8, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is Deepavali?
semester_qna.answer: Deepavali is on October 23 and October 24, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is the IEEE Conference?
semester_qna.answer: The IEEE Conference is on October 24 and October 25, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is Kannada Rajyotsava?
semester_qna.answer: Kannada Rajyotsava is on November 1, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is the project expo?
semester_qna.answer: The Project Expo is scheduled from November 10 to November 14, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When are Phase-2 project presentations?
semester_qna.answer: Phase-2 presentations are from November 17 to November 22, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is CIE-2?
semester_qna.answer: CIE-2 is from November 24 to November 26, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is the last working day for 7th sem?
semester_qna.answer: The last working day is December 6, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When are lab internals?
semester_qna.answer: Lab internals are from December 1 to December 5, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When is report submission?
semester_qna.answer: Report submission is between December 1 and December 5, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When do theory exams start?
semester_qna.answer: Theory examinations begin on December 6, 2025.

semester_qna.question: When are practical/viva exams?
semester_qna.answer: Practical and viva exams are from January 4 to January 10, 2026.

semester_qna.question: What is the Monday timetable for 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: DL → CNS → Break → Parallel Computing → IoT → Project Work.

semester_qna.question: What is the Tuesday timetable for 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: CNS → DL → IoT → Parallel Computing → IoT Lab.

semester_qna.question: What is the Wednesday timetable for 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: Parallel Computing → DL → IoT → OEC → IoT Lab.

semester_qna.question: What is the Thursday timetable for 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: DL → IoT → CNS → OEC → PC Lab.

semester_qna.question: What is the Friday timetable for 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: CNS → OEC → DL → IoT → PC Lab.

semester_qna.question: Who teaches IoT in 7th sem A?
semester_qna.answer: IoT (BCS701) is taught by Dr. Bharathesh Patel N.

semester_qna.question: Who teaches Parallel Computing?
semester_qna.answer: Parallel Computing (BCS702) is taught by Dr. Divya S.

semester_qna.question: Who teaches Cryptography & Network Security?
semester_qna.answer: CNS (BCS703) is taught by Sariya Anjum.

semester_qna.question: Who teaches Deep Learning?
semester_qna.answer: Deep Learning (BCS714A) is taught by Ashwini T S.

semester_qna.question: Who teaches OEC?
semester_qna.answer: OEC (BCV755B) is taught by Prabhavathy M.

semester_qna.question: What is the subject code for IoT?
semester_qna.answer: BCS701

semester_qna.question: What is the subject code for Parallel Computing?
semester_qna.answer: BCS702

semester_qna.question: What is the subject code for CNS?
semester_qna.answer: BCS703

semester_qna.question: What is the subject code for Deep Learning?
semester_qna.answer: BCS714A

semester_qna.question: What is the subject code for OEC?
semester_qna.answer: BCV755B

semester_qna.question: How many credits is IoT?
semester_qna.answer: IoT (BCS701) carries 4 credits.

semester_qna.question: How many credits is Parallel Computing?
semester_qna.answer: Parallel Computing (BCS702) carries 4 credits.

semester_qna.question: How many credits is CNS?
semester_qna.answer: Cryptography & Network Security carries 4 credits.

semester_qna.question: How many credits is Deep Learning?
semester_qna.answer: Deep Learning carries 3 credits.

semester_qna.question: How many credits is OEC?
semester_qna.answer: OEC carries 3 credits.

semester_qna.question: How many credits is project work?
semester_qna.answer: Project Work Phase II carries 6 credits.

semester_qna.question: What time do classes start?
semester_qna.answer: Classes start at 9:15 AM.

semester_qna.question: What time do classes end?
semester_qna.answer: Classes end at 4:15 PM.

semester_qna.question: Is there a lunch break?
semester_qna.answer: Yes, lunch break is from 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM.
